description: Asagi Caldwell is one of three young women who serve as the test pilots for MBF-M1 Astray in Mobile Suit Gundam SEED. Asagi, distinguished by her blonde hair, is effectively the leader of the trio. When these inexperienced test pilots are plunged into real combat, Asagi manages to turn them into a formidable fighting team. She is killed by an EA Strike Dagger.
name: Asagi Caldwell
